participant_1.background:
I sometimes miss my friends because I have a pet iguana that takes up a lot of my time.
i like to watch people pray together.
I love nature documentaries because they make me feel like I'm exploring the wilderness without leaving my couch.
I love seafood because I fish for it myself.
I met my family through adoption, and I am so grateful to have them in my life.

i working in a publishing building.
I felt like I was going to have a heart attack when my coworker yelled at me in front of the whole office.
i ve studied ballet all my life.
I love my mother because she's always been there for me.

content.text: It was good, thanks! I'm just getting ready to go home for the day.
Nice! I'm about to head to the park. I like to go fishing there.
That's cool! I love the park. I remember going there with my mom when I was little.
Me too! It's always been a special place for me. What kind of work do you do?
I work in a publishing building. I'm a copy editor.
Oh cool! I've always been interested in writing.
Me too! I love reading and writing.
I have a lot of favorite books, but one of my favorites is To Kill a Mockingbird.
That's a great book! I love Harper Lee's writing style.
I've been trying to read more lately. I've been really busy with work, but I'm trying to make time for it.
That's good! Reading is a great way to relax and learn new things.
Yeah, it is. I'm glad you love reading too.
Me too! It's a great way to escape from the world for a while.
Yeah, it is. I'm going to head to the park now. I'll talk to you later!
